text: In-App Private Viewer: enjoy the convenience of viewing Images on Mobile devices when using External Links.
Faster Access to Big PDF Files: optimised the In-App Viewer to ensure swift and efficient opening of large PDF files.
Improved User Experience: introduced intuitive icons for PDFs and eye-catching thumbnails for Images throughout the application, making it effortless to find your desired items.
Enhanced Cybersecurity: regular cyber reviews including software libraries & packages updates to tackle potential vulnerabilities.
